meanings.definition: Administer drugs to (a racehorse, greyhound, or athlete) in order to inhibit or enhance sporting performance.
meanings.sent1: The athlete was caught doped before the big race.
meanings.sent2: It is unfair to compete in sports while doped.
meanings.sent3: The doped horse thought it could fly over the hurdles!
meanings.sent4: Her performance soared as if doped with magic.
meanings.sent5: The image of the doped runner crossing the finish line stayed in everyone's mind.

meanings.definition: Add an impurity to (a semiconductor) to produce a desired electrical characteristic.
meanings.sent1: The technician carefully doped the semiconductor for better conductivity.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device may not work properly if doped incorrectly.
meanings.sent3: The doped computer chip seemed to have a mind of its own!
meanings.sent4: The doped semiconductor sparkled with newfound energy.
meanings.sent5: The doped material glowed brightly under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Treat (a material) with a dopant to modify its electrical properties.
meanings.sent1: The engineers doped the material to improve its conductivity.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to follow the instructions when doped the substance.
meanings.sent3: The doped fabric seemed to have a secret power!
meanings.sent4: The doped material hummed with energy like a charged battery.
meanings.sent5: The doped sample displayed remarkable changes in its properties.
